info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 4:25PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Kern County through 515 PM PDT... At 424 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lamont, or 7 miles east of Bakersfield, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bakersfield, Lamont and Edison. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
